name: Loot Collection: Mahjong (itch)
description:
Loot Collection Mahjong is the perfect game for the casual player looking for fun and extensive gameplay.
The goal of this game is to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board. The game is finished when all pairs of tiles have been removed from the board.

Game Features:
- Undo
- Hint
- Shuffle
- Highlight
- Loot icons
- Many levels
